about:
Designed for JavaScript beginners & all the cool nerds out there, this app is a placeground to put your array manipulation skills to the test.

 You'll find a variety of challenges for which I've included a handful of clues & an example solution to guide you if you're stuck or just curious what happens if you click that button.

 But remember — there's no “right” way to solve a problem.

 If your code works, you did it. Pat yourself on the back & keep on hackin’.
